person.persName: Patrick Henry Clay Bruce (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Malinda Bruce. Father of Marthia Bruce, Thomas H. Bruce, John Bruce, Alexander Bruce, Laura Bruce, and Isabella Bruce.
